FTVectoriser Class Reference

#include <FTVectoriser.h>

Detailed Description

FTVectoriser class is a helper class that converts font outlines into point data.

See also:
FTExtrdGlyph

FTOutlineGlyph

FTPolyGlyph

FTContour

FTPoint
